verses.verse: And he entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue; <S%G4864><s%> and there was a man <S%G444><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> a withered <S%G3583><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>
And they watched <S%G3906><s%> him, whether <S%G1487><s%> he would heal <S%G2323><s%> him on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day; that they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> him.
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to the man <S%G444><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> the withered <S%G3583><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> Stand <S%G1453><s%> forth. <S%G1519><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do <S%G15><s%> good <S%G15><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> days, or <S%G2228><s%> to do <S%G2554><s%> evil? <S%G2554><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> life, <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to kill? <S%G615><s%> But they held <S%G4623><s%> their peace. <S%G4623><s%>

And when he had looked <S%G4017><s%> round <S%G4017><s%> about <S%G4017><s%> on them with anger, <S%G3709><s%> being grieved <S%G4818><s%> for the hardness <S%G4457><s%> of their hearts, <S%G2588><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to the man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> And he stretched <S%G1614><s%> it out: and his hand <S%G5495><s%> was restored <S%G600><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> as the other. <S%G243><s%>

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and straightway <S%G2112><s%> took <S%G4160><s%> counsel <S%G4824><s%> with the Herodians <S%G2265><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him, how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> himself with his disciples <S%G3101><s%> to the sea: <S%G2281><s%> and a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> from Galilee <S%G1056><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, and from Judaea, <S%G2449><s%>

And from Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and from Idumaea, <S%G2401><s%> and from beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan; <S%G2446><s%> and they about <S%G4012><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G4128><s%> when they had heard <S%G191><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things he did, <S%G4160><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to him.

And he spoke <S%G2036><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> that a small <S%G4142><s%> ship <S%G4142><s%> should wait <S%G4342><s%> on <S%G4342><s%> him because <S%G1223><s%> of the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should throng <S%G2346><s%> him.

For he had healed <S%G2323><s%> many; <S%G4183><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they pressed <S%G1968><s%> on him for to touch <S%G680><s%> him, as many <S%G3745><s%> as had <S%G2192><s%> plagues. <S%G3148><s%>

And unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they saw <S%G2334><s%> him, fell <S%G4363><s%> down before <S%G4363><s%> him, and cried, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And he straightly <S%G4183><s%> charged <S%G2008><s%> them that they should not make <S%G4160><s%> him known. <S%G5318><s%>
And he goes <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and calls <S%G4341><s%> to him whom <S%G3739><s%> he would: <S%G2309><s%> and they came <S%G565><s%> to him.
And he ordained <S%G4160><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> that they should be with him, and that he might send <S%G649><s%> them forth <S%G649><s%> to preach, <S%G2784><s%>
And to have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> sicknesses, <S%G3554><s%> and to cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils: <S%G1140><s%>
And Simon <S%G4613><s%> he surnamed <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Peter; <S%G4074><s%>

And James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of James; <S%G2385><s%> and he surnamed <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3686><s%> them Boanerges, <S%G993><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is, The sons <S%G5207><s%> of thunder: <S%G1027><s%>

And Andrew, <S%G406><s%> and Philip, <S%G5376><s%> and Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%> and Matthew, <S%G3156><s%> and Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> and Thaddaeus, <S%G2280><s%> and Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Canaanite, <S%G2581><s%>
And Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> which <S%G2076><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him: and they went <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an house. <S%G3624><s%>

And the multitude <S%G3793><s%> comes <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they could <S%G1410><s%> not so <S%G3383><s%> much <S%G3383><s%> as eat <S%G5315><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And when his friends <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3844><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of it, they went <S%G1831><s%> out to lay hold <S%G2902><s%> on him: for they said, <S%G3004><s%> He is beside <S%G1839><s%> himself.

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> Beelzebub, <S%G954><s%> and by the prince <S%G758><s%> of the devils <S%G1140><s%> casts <S%G1544><s%> he out devils. <S%G1140><s%>
And he called <S%G4341><s%> them to him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them in parables, <S%G3850><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out Satan? <S%G4567><s%>
And if <S%G1437><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself, <S%G1438><s%> that kingdom <S%G932><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>
And if <S%G1437><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself, <S%G1438><s%> that house <S%G3614><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> rise <S%G450><s%> up against <S%G1909><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and be divided, <S%G3307><s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand, <S%G2476><s%> but has <S%G2192><s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> man's house, <S%G3614><s%> and spoil <S%G1283><s%> his goods, <S%G4632><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> he will first <S%G4412><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> the strong <S%G2478><s%> man; <S%G2478><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> he will spoil <S%G1283><s%> his house. <S%G3614><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, All <S%G3956><s%> sins <S%G265><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> to the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> and blasphemies <S%G988><s%> with which <S%G3745><s%> soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> they shall blaspheme: <S%G987><s%>

But he that shall blaspheme <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> forgiveness, <S%G859><s%> but is in danger <S%G1777><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> damnation. <S%G2920><s%>
Because <S%G3754><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

There came <S%G2064><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> his brothers <S%G80><s%> and his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and, standing <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> to him, calling <S%G5455><s%> him.

And the multitude <S%G3793><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him, and they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Behold, <S%G2396><s%> your mother <S%G3384><s%> and your brothers <S%G80><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> for you.
And he answered <S%G611><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is my mother, <S%G3384><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> my brothers? <S%G80><s%>

And he looked <S%G4017><s%> round <S%G2943><s%> about <S%G2945><s%> on them which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> my mother <S%G3384><s%> and my brothers! <S%G80><s%>
